msg.msgText:
An "Endpoint" composite object can be created using the "create" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver create Endpoint help imaserver create Endpoint "Name=value" "Item=value" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver create Endpoint "Name=TestEP" "Protocol=JMS"
Configuration items for "Endpoint" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
